name: Happy Makeover: Zen Match
description:
Do you love home design and decorating? Happy Makeover is the brand new home design game. It melts with tile puzzle game which double your happiness and offer you unique game experience. You must not miss this game! Beat these stress-relief match-3 tiles and decorate luxury houses and villas!

You are a star interior designer. Use your creative talent to build dreamy house. Inspire your life by meeting all the challengeable quests and build from external structure to the interior decoration details, all decorations need to be chosen by yourself! There are large amount of furniture and countless colors for you to select, you can mix and match home designs in different styles. More and more customers are waiting for you to decorate their dream home, are you ready for it?

Different from other "home design" games, Happy Makeover also make you a tile master! While enjoying the journey of your home design makeover, beat the match-3 levels to win more rewards and boosts. It will train your brain flexibility and exercise your memory ability! It will give you a calm atmosphere and you will find yourself at pure relaxing mood. Try it out and have this special experience!

Features:
1.Hundreds of levels never make you feel bored!
2.Gorgeous furniture and luxurious decorations give your visual satisfaction!
3.The combination of match-3 and home design double your happiness!
4.Cultivate your design talent and also exercise your brain flexibility!
5.Fun events and mysterious rewards are waiting for you!

Move now!! Download Happy Makeover! It's a wonderful choice to spend your leisure time! Start your journey of happy Makeover now!
